articles.author: Pamela McClintock
articles.title: Why 'Tenet' and 'Mulan' Can Succeed Even If Theaters Slash Seating - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Before COVID-19, it wasn't unusual for 50 percent of seats at U.S. theaters to remain empty on the weekends without dampening business overall.
